long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shop at hundreds of stores and get cash back everytime you shop.

Browse via 21 categories that are advertised (Stores, Coupons, Specials etc.,) or via the search bar.

Choose a retailer or product then simply click through to the stores website and start shopping as you would normally. The price of the product will be the same as you would have visited them directly.

Buy from any of the hundreds of the listed stores and earn cash back on everything you purchase even if the items are 70% discounted.
